title: 服务器一直弹黄色警告问题
txt_content:
服务器控制台一直在弹出这2种报错，玩家有时候还会掉线，求各位帮忙解决，谢谢！

[08:26:42] [Server thread/WARN] [net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 2372ms behind, skipping 47 tick(s)
[08:28:49] [Server thread/WARN] [net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 2067ms behind, skipping 41 tick(s)

[21:23:11] [HikariPool-3 housekeeper/WARN] [com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.HikariPool]: HikariPool-3 - Thread starvation or clock leap detected (housekeeper delta=1m1s208ms539?s300ns).
[21:23:13] [HikariPool-2 housekeeper/WARN] [com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.HikariPool]: HikariPool-2 - Thread starvation or clock leap detected (housekeeper delta=1m615ms347?s300ns).
[21:23:13] [HikariPool-4 housekeeper/WARN] [com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.HikariPool]: HikariPool-4 - Thread starvation or clock leap detected (housekeeper delta=1m663ms748?s400ns).
[21:23:19] [HikariPool-1 housekeeper/WARN] [com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.HikariPool]: HikariPool-1 - Thread starvation or clock leap detected (housekeeper delta=1m948ms810?s100ns).
[21:23:27] [HikariPool-7 housekeeper/WARN] [com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.HikariPool]: HikariPool-7 - Thread starvation or clock leap detected (housekeeper delta=59s575ms329?s500ns).
[21:23:34] [HikariPool-5 housekeeper/WARN] [com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.HikariPool]: HikariPool-5 - Thread starvation or clock leap detected (housekeeper delta=1m264ms643?s400ns).
[21:23:36] [HikariPool-6 housekeeper/WARN] [com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.HikariPool]: HikariPool-6 - Thread starvation or clock leap detected (housekeeper delta=1m946ms105?s600ns).

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
[优化]AsyncKeepAlive —— 减少网络卡顿掉线的概率[1.7.2-1.8.8]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-491106-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

试试这个

结城希亚 发表于 2020-4-21 08:50
[优化]AsyncKeepAlive —— 减少网络卡顿掉线的概率[1.7.2-1.8.8]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-491106-1- ...
看了下这插件  我服务器端用的是1.12.2 貌似不兼容啊

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
13504242828 发表于 2020-4-21 08:59
看了下这插件  我服务器端用的是1.12.2 貌似不兼容啊
前者是因为你服务器跟不上你的服务端了，需要升级

后者可以无视，用CSF加入关键词屏蔽即可
[综合|优化]Console Spam Fix —— 让控制台变得干净[1.7-1.15]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-912870-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

InitAuther97 发表于 2020-4-21 08:54
前两个是服务器高度卡顿的报警，后几个是服务器高度卡顿引起的。（执行周期过长或者系统时间倒流。）
看起 ...
前2个的高度卡顿对服务器的延迟影响大吗。。。
还有我原来用的华为云2核4G 感觉不够用换的天翼云8核16G之后就出现这种问题了.....

replies.author: Redstone_ray
replies.txt_content:
Not really anything to worry about if this rarely occurs. Basically it indicates a certain amount of CPU starvation. The housekeeper thread is scheduled to run every 30 seconds, but there was over a minute that elapsed between runs. I wouldn't be too worried unless you see this several times per hour.

这是插件作者的原话
你的CPU跟不上服务器，TPS太低导致的正常30秒跑一次的thread慢到一分钟以上

Redstone_ray 发表于 2020-4-21 09:33
Not really anything to worry about if this rarely occurs. Basically it indicates a certain amount of ...
CPU是xeon gold 6161 分配了8核 这个配置我觉得也差不多吧 请问dalao有可行的解决方案嘛
